item.title: 友情链接
item.description:
SOME导航网站链接整理
一、侧边栏链接 - Nekooy个人主页: https://nekooy.com - Nekooy's 博客: https://blog.nekooy.com
二、搜索引擎 - 必应: https://www.bing.com/search?q= - 谷歌: https://www.google.com/search?q= - 百度: https://www.baidu.com/s?word= - 番组计划: https://bgm.tv/subject_search/ - 微信: https://weixin.sogou.com/weixinwap?ie=utf8&type=2&pg=webSearchList&_sug_=y&_sug_type_=&query= - 知乎: https://www.zhihu.com/search?q= - bgm搜: https://search.ecnu.cf/search?q=site:bgm.tv
三、元站 - B站-bilibili: https://bilibili.com - 班固米: https://bgm.tv - 豆瓣: https://www.douban.com - 萌娘百科: https://zh.moegirl.org.cn - 今热榜: https://rebang.today/home?tab=zhihu
四、工具类 1. 开发工具 - GitHub: https://github.com/ - 脚本: https://greasyfork.org/zh-CN - JSBIN: https://jsbin.com/?html
2. 搜索引擎 - 必应Bing: https://bing.com - 维基百科: https://www.wikipedia.ecnu.cf/
3. AI工具 - ChatGPT: https://chatgpt.com/ - 豆包: https://www.doubao.com/chat/
4. 实用工具 - keepass: https://app.keeweb.info/ - AutoBangumi: https://github.com/EstrellaXD/Auto_Bangumi - BGM相关的坑: https://github.com/bangumi-users/awesome-bangumi - PT: https://wiki.ukenn.top/
5. 网络工具 - Cloudflare DNS: https://1.1.1.1/
6. 设计工具 - Canva: https://www.canva.com/ - Figma: https://www.figma.com/
五、社交类 1. 社交媒体 - 微博: https://weibo.com/ - 知乎: https://www.zhihu.com/ - B站动态: https://t.bilibili.com/
2. 邮箱和账号服务 - 微软帐号: https://account.microsoft.com - QQ邮箱: https://mail.qq.com - Outlook: https://outlook.live.com/
六、观看下载类 1. 动漫观看平台 - 桜漫: https://skr.cc - 稀饭: https://dick.xfani.com/ - Libvio: https://libvio.app/
2. 动漫下载资源 - 蜜柑计划: https://mikanime.tv/ - 动漫花园镜像: https://www.dongmanhuayuan.com/ - 同步: https://dongmanhuayuan.myheartsite.com - Waaa镜像: https://portal.waaa.moe/?page_id=160
3. 影视资源 - 影猫の仓库: https://ymck.me/
4. 综合资源 - 文库吧: https://www.wenku8.net/modules/article/search.php?searchtype=articlename&searchkey= - 弹弹play: https://www.dandanplay.com/ - Ani: https://myani.org/
七、云游戏类 - 4399云游戏: https://y.4399.com/ - 咪咕快游: https://www.migufun.com - 网易云游戏: https://cg.163.com
八、资源整合类 - 木晞i: https://yftdtddh.github.io/muxizyhz/ - 资源贴集合: http://chii.in/blog/319400 - 好物汇blog: http://chii.in/blog/321493 - 桜岛: https://all.cc
九、资讯类 1. 技术资讯 - 掘金: https://juejin.cn/ - CSDN: https://www.csdn.net/ - InfoQ: https://www.infoq.cn/
2. 资讯平台 - 虎嗅: https://m.huxiu.com
十、教育学习类 1. 在线学习 - Udemy: https://www.udemy.com/ - Coursera: https://www.coursera.org/ - 网易云课堂: https://study.163.com/
2. 文档工具 - Google文档: https://docs.google.com/ - Notion: https://www.notion.so/ - 石墨文档: https://shimo.im/
十一、趣站类 - type: https://www.typingclub.com/ - banπ: https://sspai.com/post/70438 - 多标签搜动漫: https://windrises.net/bgmtools/multitag - 新多标签搜动漫1: https://chii.ai/search - 新多标签搜动漫2: https://cityhunter.me/ - 阿飞老师: https://m.bilibili.com/video/BV1Bp4y1D747?p=2 - bgm-webapp: https://bangumi-app.5t5.top/iframe.html?viewMode=story&id=screens-discovery--discovery - Clover: http://www.clover.ly/#projects。
